name: Roleplay Time Duo(Undertale Fan Game)
description: Story: Once upon a time there lived two races, people and monsters. Once they started a war in which people defeated and they imprisoned monsters in a dungeon. Once Chara fell into this dungeon. And Chara began genocide. Chara reset the world and teleported with the help of determination to others But Chara once got into the Dimension of DksetyVerse. Evgen and Dksety did not like this genocide and in the last corridor they and Chara staged a battle to the death.
